title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1931.3 - Participation by minority group members and women
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1931.3 - Participation by minority group members and women

State Regulations

All activities funded in whole or in part under the
program shall be consistent with all relevant State equal employment
opportunity, nondiscrimination, and fair housing laws. All awards of over
$100,000 shall require the eligible applicant, for projects in which bids are
required, to submit for approval of the corporation a utilization plan as
defined in section 310, subsection 9, of the New York State Executive Law
(Executive Law) prior to the award. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1931.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
